body:
As Brad mentioned #11637 <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/11637> appears
to be the issue. The GC culprits are firing every 120 seconds which is
further indication that this is the issue.

We are working on it.... Thanks for your help.


On Thu, Sep 3, 2015 at 4:44 PM, Christoffer Hallas <notifications@github.com
